'''Radiant Spincrystal 112''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] ''[[A Sweet Dream in Fontaine]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located on top of some terrain above the [[Prototype Cal. Breguet]] boss arena in the [[Academic Assembly Hall]].
